titles.title: A bill to amend the Defense Production Act of 1950, as amended, to prohibit the Department of Defense from acquiring transportation services from countries which are signatories to the Warsaw Pact.

bill.summary: 9/14/1987--Introduced. Prohibits the Department of Defense from entering into a contract for transportation services with countries which are signatories to the Warsaw Pact, or with contractors who are citizens of such countries, with specified exceptions.
